trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> from other data types.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>從其他資料類型。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollectionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollectionConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個轉換器是否可以轉換指定之類型的物件執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的來源類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert the provided type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換可以將提供之類型的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷執行個體是否<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>可以轉換為不同的型別。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的來源類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is always returned because the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> cannot be converted to another type.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>因此，一律會傳回<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>無法轉換成另一種類型。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的物件轉換成的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Describes the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> of the type being converted.
trans-unit.target: 描述<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>轉換類型。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: The instance of created from the converted input.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體所建立的已轉換 input 。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if input is or is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果會發生 input 是或不是有效的類型轉換。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified string to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的字串轉換成的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the `text` parameter can either be "None", or a combination of the predefined <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> names delimited by commas, such as "Underline, Strikethrough".
trans-unit.target: 字串值`text`參數可以是 「 無 」，或預先定義之組合<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration>以逗號分隔的名稱如"底線、 刪除線 」。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration>

trans-unit.source: The names are case-insensitive values.
trans-unit.target: 名稱是不區分大小寫的值。

trans-unit.source: One or more blanks spaces can precede or follow each text decoration name or comma.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個空白空間可以前後的每個文字裝飾名稱或逗號。

trans-unit.source: In addition, duplicate text decoration names are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，不允許重複的文字裝飾名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to be converted into the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>轉換成<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The instance of created from the converted text.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體所建立的已轉換 text 。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>至指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Describes the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> of the type being converted.
trans-unit.target: 描述<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>轉換類型。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>轉換。

trans-unit.source: The type this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> is converted to.
trans-unit.target: 類型的這個執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>轉換成。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is always returned because <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> cannot be converted to any other type.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>因此，一律會傳回<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>無法轉換成任何其他型別。
